channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: A deadly flight out of Wichita has one of America’s most historic aviation cities reeling
item.description: A deadly collision between a passenger airliner and an Army helicopter left Kansas’ largest city grieving. The passenger airline took from Wichita.

item.title: Pilots have reported repeated close calls similar to fatal collision near DC airport
‘Heartbreaking’ search for those killed in DC air crash as army helicopter’s black box recovered
